EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: I asked how she did it.
I asked how to do it.
I asked.
I asked him.
I asked a question.
I asked him about it.
I asked him whether he was going.
I asked him what he was doing.
I asked him whether to clean the house.
He asked him what to do.
He asked about whether he wanted to go.

DESCRIPTION.primary: NP V NP PP.topic what S

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: He asked him about what he wanted.
He asked about whether to go.
He asked about what to do.
I asked about it.
He asked of her how it works.
He asked of her how to do it.
He asked of her about whether he should kill the peasants.

DESCRIPTION.primary: NP V PP.recipient PP.topic what S

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: He asked of her about what he should do.

DESCRIPTION.primary: NP V PP.recipient PP.topic what S_INF

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: He asked of her about what to do.

DESCRIPTION.primary: NP V PP.recipient PP.topic whether S_INF

EXAMPLES.EXAMPLE: I asked of him about whether to go.
He asked whether he should come.
He asked what he should do.
He asked whether to clean the house.
He asked what to do.
He asked him how he came.
